card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to the Time Capsule. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to the Time Capsule.
voice.prompt: When you are ready to begin the game, step into the time machine.

voice.intro:
Welcome to the Time Capsule! The game has now begun.

A time machine. A fantastical object that you have created. You step into the machine, with your toolbox, looking to finish up the final touches.
voice.prompt: Would you like to finish up the back of the machine, or the front?

utterances: the front of the time machine
finish up the front of the time machine
finish the front of the time machine
the back of the time machine
finish up the back of the time machine
finish the back of the time machine
do not turn on the time machine

card.title: You enter the Greek Empire.
card.text: You fall out of the machine and are greeted by a blinding light. The light of a torch, but not like you imagined. It was fire, and the face of an old man. He smiled, “(in greek) Hello young one.”

voice.intro:
You fall out of the machine and are greeted by a blinding light. The light of a torch, but not like you imagined. It was fire, and the face of an old man. He smiled, “(in greek) Hello young one.”

You have no idea what he said, or what was going on. Had you accidentally activated the time machine? Looking in your pocket you realize that you still have your translator to understand the international scientists you were working with.
voice.prompt: Would you like to activate it?

card.title: You win!
card.text: You avoid all the time-based shenanigans and go back to your ordinary life.

voice.intro: You avoid all the time-based schenanigans and go back to your ordinary life. Congratulations!

card.title: You activate your translator.
card.text:
You activate your translator, which has only a little charge left, and you start to understand the man’s speech.

He says, in an old gravelly tone, “Are you here to save us from the monster?"

voice.intro: You activate your translator, which has only a little charge left, and you start to understand the man’s speech.
voice.prompt: Yes, no...? Answer quickly!

card.title: You enter the Future, at 2055 CE.

voice.intro:
You step out of your time machine and find yourself on the sidewalk of what is seemingly a major metropolitan district. The cars on the street rush by you, but in a solid formation, as if they all coordinated to move in unison.

You look around for any street sign to see where you are, and then realize that there are none. Nor are there any traffic lights, bizarrely. At the intersection, the cars just zip past each other without turn signals or traffic lights. Remarkably, there are no crashes.

Exasperated, you wave your hands in the air, disturbing some passersby who grumble and then look back at their paper-thin phones. However, a bus suddenly breaks formation and does a perfect parallel park near you. You must have signaled to them by accident?
voice.prompt: Get in the bus?

card.title: You get in the bus.
card.text: Taking your seat, a display flashes to life in front of you, requesting for a payment of… 0.005 Bitcoin? In a pictograph on the side, it suggests placing a bitcoin payment card in the card slot. There’s also an option to Pay with Legacy US Dollar.

voice.intro: You win!
voice.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "Start again." Otherwise you can say "Exit skill."

card.title: You lose
card.text:
You spend your days meandering, trying to figure out what's going on. Eventually you resign yourself to the fact that you'll never understand.

You lose.

voice.intro:
You spend your days meandering, trying to figure out what's going on. Eventually you resign yourself to the fact that you'll never understand.

You lose.

card.title: Someone comes up to you.
card.text:
Someone comes up to you, noticing your puzzled expression.
“Hey! Just flew in? You from the Rurals, or what?” Your look of mute confusion seems to suffice for an answer. “Yeah, so while you might still use the US dollar over in your rural parts of the country, around here the city’s switched all the way to cryptocurrency. Just a swipe of your card, and you can get anything in the city!” He demonstrates, inserting his payment card, pressing a button to accept a payment of 0.005 Bitcoin, and after a few seconds it is accepted. “Oh wait, you don’t have a card do you? No problem! Let’s just go to the visitor center and get you one.”

voice.intro:
Someone comes up to you, noticing your puzzled expression.
“Hey! Just flew in? You from the Rurals, or what?” Your look of mute confusion seems to suffice for an answer. “Yeah, so while you might still use the US dollar over in your rural parts of the country, around here the city’s switched all the way to cryptocurrency. Just a swipe of your card, and you can get anything in the city!” He demonstrates, inserting his payment card, pressing a button to accept a payment of 0.005 Bitcoin, and after a few seconds it is accepted. “Oh wait, you don’t have a card do you? No problem! Let’s just go to the visitor center and get you one.”
voice.prompt: You enter the visitor center.

card.title: You don't have any.
card.text: Uh, you don’t have any? Nor do you have this weird “hardware wallet” device, as it suggests. It’s probably good that someone sits down next to you, noticing your puzzled expression.

voice.intro: Uh, you don’t have any? Nor do you have this weird “hardware wallet” device, as it suggests. It’s probably good that someone sits down next to you, noticing your puzzled expression.
voice.prompt: Do you talk to them?

card.title: You smash the translator.
card.text: “HULKKKK SMAASH”. For some reason, after breaking the item, you end up being able to understand everything?

voice.intro:
“HULKKKK SMAASH”. For some reason, after breaking the item, you end up being able to understand everything?

He says, in an old gravelly tone, “Are you here to save us from the monster?"
voice.prompt: Yes, no… answer quickly!

card.title: The man tells you about the Greek Sphinx.
card.text: “Thank you, good traveler.” Now enter the Sphinx’s lair! But, be warned. This is a Greek Monster… it challenged even Oedipus, one of the smartest to ever exist, in its riddles. If you would like to learn more, say, “Alexa, tell me about the Greek Sphinx”.

voice.intro: “Thank you, good traveler.” Now enter the Sphinx’s lair! But, be warned. This is a Greek Monster… it challenged even Oedipus, one of the smartest to ever exist, in its riddles.
voice.prompt: If you would like to learn more, say, “Alexa, tell me about the Greek Sphinx”. Otherwise, just continue.

utterances: alexa tell me more about the greek sphinx
alexa tell me about the greek sphinx
tell me about the greek sphinx
tell me more about the greek sphinx
tell me more about the sphinx

card.title: The Greek Sphinx
card.text:
According to Wikipedia:

A sphinx (Ancient Greek: Σφίγξ [spʰíŋks], Boeotian: Φίξ [pʰíːks], plural sphinxes or sphinges) is a mythical creature with the head of a human and the body of a lion.

In Greek tradition, it has the head of a human, the haunches of a lion, and sometimes the wings of a bird. It is mythicised as treacherous and merciless. Those who cannot answer its riddle suffer a fate typical in such mythological stories, as they are killed and eaten by this ravenous monster.
card.prompt: Press any key, uh I meant say return to return.

voice.intro:
A sphinx is a mythical creature with the head of a human and the body of a lion.

In Greek tradition, it has the head of a human, the haunches of a lion, and sometimes the wings of a bird. It is mythicised as treacherous and merciless. Those who cannot answer its riddle suffer a fate typical in such mythological stories, as they are killed and eaten by this ravenous monster.
voice.prompt: Say return to go back.

card.title: The man prepares you to battle.
card.text: The man arms you with all the necessary components to get through the lair. The Greeks are evidently very good at geometry, or the study of shapes, and were able to provide you with a well-working chariot.
card.prompt: If you would like to be able to do the same, ask Alexa about geometry. Otherwise, enter the lair.

voice.intro: The man arms you with all the necessary components to get through the lair. The Greeks are evidently very good at geometry, or the study of shapes, and were able to provide you with a well-working chariot.
voice.prompt: If you would like to be able to do the same, ask Alexa about geometry. Otherwise, enter the lair.

card.title: Geometry
card.text: According to Wikipedia, Geometry  is a branch of mathematics concerned with questions of shape, size, relative position of figures, and the properties of space. A mathematician who works in the field of geometry is called a geometer.

voice.intro: According to Wikipedia, Geometry  is a branch of mathematics concerned with questions of shape, size, relative position of figures, and the properties of space. A mathematician who works in the field of geometry is called a geometer.

card.title: Sphinx
card.text: You go into the Sphinx's lair, who offers you 2 questions. If you get them write, you get fuel for your time machine. If you are wrong, then the monster would invade! Say continue, to begin.

voice.intro: You go into the Sphinx's lair, who offers you 2 questions. If you get them write, you get fuel for your time machine. If you are wrong, then the monster would invade!

card.title: You attempt to escape.
card.text: You try to escape, but the man blocks you. He sighs sadly as the monster engulfs the town.

voice.intro:
You try to escape, but the man blocks you. He sighs sadly as the monster engulfs the town.

Game over.

card.title: Question one!
card.text: Is the study of Geometry about shapes?

voice.intro: Question one! Is the study of Geometry about shapes?

card.title: You run into the forest.
card.text: You run away into a maze like forest. It is pitch black and you are having trouble seeing things.
card.prompt: You can go north, south, or west.

voice.intro: You run away into a maze like forest. It is pitch black and you are having trouble seeing things.

card.title: Good
card.text: You go north but find nothing, so you go back and head east.

voice.intro: You go North, but find nothing, so you go back and go East.

card.title: Go South
card.text:
There appears to be a dead end. Suddenly, the door behind you shuts, an intricate trap used quite frequently by Greek Hunters. There is no use.

Game Over

voice.intro:
There appears to be a dead end. Suddenly, the door behind you shuts, an intricate trap used quite frequently by Greek Hunters.

Game Over

card.title: Death
card.text: You reach a clearing with a dead end. There appears to be a bear there.
card.prompt: It seems there's nowhere to go from here except back.

voice.intro: There is a bear. It seems aggressive. You feel like you shouldn’t spend that much time on internal monologues right now. Unfortunately, the bear doesn't have time for that either. Game over.

card.title: More info to Chinese Empire
card.text: You notice that on the back of the time machine, where the control circuit used to be, there is now an intricate bronze, clockwork design. “It’s for temporal navigation,” Hephaestus says. “It only required a slight modification to the Antikythera mechanism we already had.” You go back to time machine and… go to Chinese Empire!

voice.intro: You notice that on the back of the time machine, where the control circuit used to be, there is now an intricate bronze, clockwork design. “It’s for temporal navigation,” Hephaestus says. “It only required a slight modification to the Antikythera mechanism we already had.” You go back to time machine and… go to Chinese Empire!

card.title: North
card.text: You go North and find someone in the clearing. “I am astonished that you were able to get through that maze… you must be tired. Don’t worry, your journey back to your time is guaranteed by me. I am a Greek god and will provide you materials to get back to your own time! Unfortunately, I don’t have much time, but if you would like to learn more about me or Greek Mythology, say “Alexa, tell me about the Greek god of Fire”. Else, continue.

voice.intro: “I am astonished that you were able to get through that maze… you must be tired. Don’t worry, your journey back to your time is guaranteed by me. I am a Greek god and will provide you materials to get back to your own time! Unfortunately, I don’t have much time, but if you would like to learn more about me or Greek Mythology, say “Alexa, tell me about the Greek god of Fire”. Else, continue.

card.title: You enter the Chinese Empire, at 700 AD.
card.text: The sound of the machines hisses, flinging smoke throughout the crevices of the doorway in front of you. Light blinds your eyes, as the door creaks open. As your eyes begin to recover, the aroma of what feels like cherry blossoms. You see a wide open field, filled with lush green grass waving in the breeze, and the cherry blossoms shedding their beauty. Or at least you thought they were cherry blossoms. Your time machine is analyzing them as “Yulan Magnolia”. You have no clue where you are. Do you want to look at your GPS? Yes or No?

voice.intro: The sound of the machines hisses, flinging smoke throughout the crevices of the doorway in front of you. Light blinds your eyes, as the door creaks open. As your eyes begin to recover, the aroma of what feels like cherry blossoms. You see a wide open field, filled with lush green grass waving in the breeze, and the cherry blossoms shedding their beauty. Or at least you thought they were cherry blossoms. Your time machine is analyzing them as “Yulan Magnolia”. You have no clue where you are. Do you want to look at your GPS? Yes or No?

card.title: Check GPS
card.text: You decide to check your GPS inside your time machine. Your machine hymns as it attempts to find your location .Unsurprisingly, it couldn't find you. Maybe because satellites hadn’t been invented yet. You hear a scream “Over there! (in chinese)”. You are unaware of their current intentions, and decide to turn on your translator. Do you want to stay inside the machine, or get out?

voice.intro: You decide to check your GPS inside your time machine. Your machine hymns as it attempts to find your location .Unsurprisingly, it couldn't find you. Maybe because satellites hadn’t been invented yet. You hear a scream “Over there! (in chinese)”. You are unaware of their current intentions, and decide to turn on your translator. Do you want to stay inside the machine, or get out? (Go to II)

card.title: Do not check GPS
card.text: Seemed pointless anyways considering the fact that satellites may not even exist yet. You suddenly hear multiple footsteps behind you. You hear some sounds behind you. gasping, most likely in shock. Makes sense considering you’re in a magical tube of steel. Considering that this is most likely not your home country, you turn on your translator. Do you get out or hide?

voice.intro: Seemed pointless anyways considering the fact that satellites may not even exist yet. You suddenly head multiple footsteps behind you. You hear some sounds behind you. gasping, most likely in shock. Makes sense considering you’re in a magical tube of steel. Considering that this is most likely not your home country, you turn on your translator. Do you get out or hide?

card.title: Leave inside time machine
card.text: You left the machine, and realized the footsteps belonged to soldiers. You quickly grab the brain of the time machine, and strap it to your arm. The translator pings you and reveals the owner of the voice heard before. It belonged to General Xue Rengui of China’s Tang Dynasty. It all gets put together in your head as you realize you’re in China. Soldiers are still coming towards you. Will you get up and put your hands up or activate the time machine and see if you can get out somehow?

voice.intro: You left the machine, and realized the footsteps belonged to soldiers. You quickly grab the brain of the time machine, and strap it to your arm. The translator pings you and reveals the owner of the voice heard before. It belonged to General Xue Rengui of China’s Tang Dynasty. It all gets put together in your head as you realize you’re in China. Soldiers are still coming towards you. Will you get up and put your hands up or activate the time machine and see if you can get out somehow?

card.title: You come out: Game Over!
card.text: You decide to stay in the machine. Sadly there is no door therefore you are quickly captures and are now unable to fix the time machine. Game Over!

voice.intro: You decide to stay in the machine. Sadly there is no door therefore you are quickly captures and are now unable to fix the time machine. Game Over!

card.title: You hold your hands up
card.text: You hold your hands up as the soldiers surround you. Xue Rengui walks and asks “Nǐ shì shuí? Nǐ zài zhèlǐ de mùdì shì shénme". Will you respond using your translator and explaining that you are from another time, or will you stay silent?

voice.intro: You hold your hands up as the soldiers surround you. Xue Rengui walks and asks “Who are you, and what is your purpose for being present here (in Chinese). Will you respond using your translator and explaining that you are from another time, or will you stay silent?

card.title: Game Over: You lose!
card.text: You are unable to fix the machine without gunpowder therefore you are capture by the Chinese army.

voice.intro: You are unable to fix the machine without gunpowder therefore you are capture by the Chinese army.

card.title: You respond
card.text: Xen Rengui is surprised, yet he takes you as a guest. He takes you to meet the almighty emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty. He seems to believe you are a special traveler meant to evaluate the dynasty. He explains to you that the dynasty is at the highest point in Chinese history, with the most immense power. He invites you to eat dinner with him. Will you accept, or explore more?

voice.intro: Xen Rengui is surprised, yet he takes you as a guest. He takes you to meet the almighty emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty. He seems to believe you are a special traveler meant to evaluate the dynasty. He explains to you that the dynasty is at the highest point in Chinese history, with the most immense power. He gives you a gift of gunpowder to show his respect. Do you take the gunpowder and leave or stay?

card.title: Game Over: You lose!
card.text: You have been captured by the Chinese army and are now unable to fix your time machine

voice.intro: You have been captured by the Chinese army and are now unable to fix your time machine

card.title: You dine with the emperor
card.text: You accept his request to dinner. You feast on hundred's of exquisite dishes, including exotics stews filled with goose, lamb, porn, rice, salt, ginger, vinegar and other hard to find ingredients. He tells you about the thriving country, entering into a Golden Age. He tells you about the thriving trade, and agriculture. Once you finish, and enjoy yourself to some fine desert, he invites you to go to the Chinese Spring Lantern Festival. Will you accept?

voice.intro: You accept his request to dinner. You feat on hundred's of exquisite dishes, including exotics stews filled with goose, lamb, porn, rice, salt, ginger, vinegar and other hard to find ingredients. Once you finish, and enjoy yourself to some fine desert, he invites you to go to the Chinese Spring Lantern Festival. Will you accept? Yes or No

card.title: You explore the empire
card.text: You decide to explore more of the Chinese empire. You hear from bystanders that the Spring Lantern Festival is occurring. Will you chose to go watch, settle down, or attempt to find someone of authority to find a way home?

voice.intro: You decide to explore more of the Chinese empire. You hear from bystanders that the Spring Lantern Festival is occurring. Will you chose to go watch, settle down, or attempt to find someone of authority to find a way home?

card.title: Settle Down: Game Over!
card.text: In the end, you find that the cherry blossoms and wide open fields have intoxicated you beyond reason, falling in love with the land. You decide to stay and enjoy the rest of your time in China. Game over!

voice.intro: In the end, you find that the cherry blossoms and wide open fields have intoxicated you beyond reason, falling in love with the land. You decide to stay and enjoy the rest of your time in China. Game over!

card.title: Explore the festival
card.text: You decide to start walking towards the commotion. You can hear the music and the dancing, and suddenly the sky erupts in bright orange. Lanterns suddenly fill the sky. What a beautiful sight as you say to yourself. Xue Rengui, a chinese general notices you and walks over to you wondering who you are. You respond explaining that you are from another time. He amazed, takes you to meet the emperor Taizong. Do you accept, or decline?

card.title: Find a way home: Game over!
card.text: You decide to try and fix the time machine. You are unable to due to missing gunpowder. Game Over!

voice.intro: You decide to try and fix the time machine. You are unable to due to missing gunpowder. Game Over!

card.title: You say yes
card.text: The emperor guides you out of his palace as you two ride towards the festival. You can hear the music and the dancing, and suddenly the sky erupts in bright orange. Lanterns suddenly fill the sky. What a beautiful sight as you say to yourself. The emperor appreciates your love for China, and offers you a gift. Do you settle down, accept his gift, or go back to fixing the time machine?

card.title: No
card.text: You say no, and the emperor understands that you must go somewhere. He gives you a gift of appreciation. Do you accept? Yes or No?

card.title: Yes: Travel to the future
card.text: You accept the emperor's gift and you receive gunpowder. This is just what you needed! You go back to your time machine and travel to the future!

card.text: You deny the gift. He was going to give you some gunpowder, but he is now offended that you didn't accept the gift. What a shame, that was what you needed to fix your time machine. Game Over!

card.title: You Accept
card.text: He takes you to meet the almighty emperor Taizong of the Tang Dynasty. He seems to believe you are a special traveler meant to evaluate the dynasty. He explains to you that the dynasty is at the highest point in Chinese history, with the most immense power. He asks you to dinner, but you say you have already eaten dinner. He asks if you're interested in China. Will you reply yes or no?

He explains to you that the dynasty is at the highest point in Chinese history, with the most immense power. He asks you to dinner, but you say you have already eaten dinner. He asks if you're interested in China. Will you reply yes or no?

card.title: You accept
card.text: You accept his request to dinner. He tells you about the thriving country, entering into a Golden Age. He tells you about the thriving trade, and agriculture. Once he is done talking, he offers you a token of appreciation. Do you accept or decline?

card.title: Accept: Travel to the future
card.text: You accept the emperor's gift and you receive gunpowder. This is just what you needed! You go back to your time machine and travel to the future!

card.title: Decline: Game Over!
card.text: You decline the gift, the emperor is offended. You go back to fixing your time machine, but you don't have gunpowder! What a shame, he was going to give you gunpowder as a gift. Game Over!

card.title: You insert a $20 bill.
card.text: Brand new, from 2018.

voice.intro: You insert a $20 bill, brand new, from 2018.
voice.prompt: Say continue for what happens next.

card.title: The building is large and profound.
card.text: The building is a soaring, glass-walled marvel, with aging banners proclaiming ZERO NET ENERGY — SOLVE CLIMATE CHANGE 2050 on them. “We should really take those down,” your new acquaintance says to you. “The whole country’s switched over to green energy for a while now. Well, except for Rhode Island. I really wish we didn’t need so many desalination plants, though,” he remarks, pointing out a row of towers on the horizon, “they’re such an eyesore. Necessary, considering our contamination of the water supply, but annoying.”

voice.intro: The building is a soaring, glass-walled marvel, with aging banners proclaiming ZERO NET ENERGY — SOLVE CLIMATE CHANGE 2050 on them. “We should really take those down,” your new acquaintance says to you. “The whole country’s switched over to green energy for a while now. Well, except for Rhode Island. I really wish we didn’t need so many desalination plants, though,” he remarks, pointing out a row of towers on the horizon, “they’re such an eyesore. Necessary, considering our contamination of the water supply, but annoying.”
voice.prompt: Say return to return.

card.title: You purchase a Bitcoin payment card.
card.text: You find a Bitcoin payment card prominently advertised, with a price of 0.001 BTC or $1.99. You purchase it and deposit half your life savings, or around $70.

voice.intro: You find a Bitcoin payment card prominently advertised, with a price of 0.001 BTC or $1.99. You purchase it and deposit half your life savings, or around $70.
voice.prompt: What do you do now? Seems like you're done here.

card.title: You desire to leave the future now. Maybe the lottery?
card.text:
Well, that’s probably enough of the future for you. Honestly it’s a little spooky. You say a quick thanks to your acquaintance and rush back outside.

You pass by signs advertising vacations on the Moon! The Final Frontier! Only 9.78 BTC each! Along with the hot new holo-iPhone of course.

Getting back in your time machine, you realize that it's out of fuel. Must have been used up from all these time travels.

And you probably don't have enough money for fuel. Especially not the Uranium 235 the machine requires.

The only thing you can think of is the lottery.

LOTTERY TIME! Says a nearby stand. Pick a number from 1 to 10. Potentially win millions!

voice.intro:

Getting back in your time machine, you realize that it's out of fuel. Must have been used up from all these time travels.

And you probably don't have enough money for fuel. Especially not the Uranium 235 the machine requires.

The only thing you can think of is the lottery.

LOTTERY TIME! Says a nearby stand. Pick a number from 1 to 10. Potentially win millions!
voice.prompt: What number do you pick?

card.title: You win!
card.text: Amazingly, you somehow win this highly unlikely lottery. A transfer of 95 BTC to your payment card confirms your new riches. Awesome!
card.prompt: What do you do now? Seems like there's a lot to explore.

card.title: Game over!
card.text: You lose the lottery. Resigning yourself to your fate, you live a nice, if somewhat impoverished, life in 2055. There are a few benefits, like electronic cash and free healthcare.

voice.intro:
Game over!

Resigning yourself to your fate, you live a nice, if somewhat impoverished, life in 2055. There are a few benefits, like electronic cash and free healthcare.

card.title: You decide to visit the moon.
card.text:
You book the next ticket to the moon.

Days later...

Looking down from the rocket onto the Earth, you are impressed as always by its beauty. The smog has been removed above China and America, replaced instead by wispy clouds. The world seems to be doing quite well!
card.prompt: After making it back home, you wonder at what to do next. You are feeling a little homesick.

card.title: You buy some military-grade uranium.
card.text:
Surprisingly easy to find in this day and age -- the perfect fuel for your time machine.

With a happy sigh, you set it to the present time, and warp back.

 THE END

card.text: You spend your last millions on fully repairing the time machine. (You give the schematics to NASA for future usage.) Finally, you go home. YOU WIN!
